title: [Eaglesoul's Outfitting]
[Eaglesoul's Combat Gear]
[Eaglesoul's Weaponry]
description: Beneath a cerulean cloud-painted ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the red dragon-inlaid walls.  A floral-etched ceramic case and a large oak table sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on a dark oak parquet floor.
